ygData.subject: Shredder is doomed
ygData.msgSnippet: Sphink watched as the bot opened fire... Is this bot insane? his wings expanded and he flew head on at the bot with his wrist guns blazing.

   Sphink watched as the bot opened fire..."Is this bot insane?" his wings 
expanded and he flew head on at the bot with his wrist guns blazing.
